data.text:
Even in these special times, we want to make sure that you feel comfortable during your flight. We kindly remind you to go through the information about our latest #boarding procedures, which you can find at the link: https://t.co/cPywiA3ehK
#WeCare https://t.co/fIvF2hESwQ

Happy to announce a new destination in collaboration with @AARairport.
Starting March 29th, 2021, three flights a week will connect #Munich with #Aarhus, the second most important Danish city after Copenhagen. https://t.co/2FlpLmzNtV
#BackInTheSkyTogether
Photo by Anders Trærup https://t.co/y945722yKG

data.text:
Out of sight doesn't always mean out of mind 💙
We think of you wherever you are and wishes you all a very nice weekend. https://t.co/WCFQOIA8bk

#StaySafe #WeAreAirDolomiti #AirDolomiti #AdAstra #Settimocielo #BackInTheSkyTogether⁣ #WeCare #StrongerTogether #HereForYou https://t.co/QtIwbU3dSa

The captain and the first officer welcome you on board! 😍❤️✈️⁣Thanks, Francesca for the marvellous📸
#BackInTheSkyTogether #WeAreAirDolomiti 
⁣https://t.co/Evndg2hP11 https://t.co/hRRWesLWhX

Stay home now, book your discounted trip and fly later! 

⏰ Offer valid from November 27th til 30th on all Air Dolomiti flights
💸 Save up to 48€
☎️ Bookable via our Sales Center +390452886140 or via salescenter@airdolomiti.it 

Terms & conditions https://t.co/c5w27g7eaY https://t.co/45DEQ6PBDs

#AirDolomiti obtains the renewal of the certification ISO 9001 and ISO/IEC 27001 following the audit by the team of DNV GL – Business Assurance. 
For more info https://t.co/rqLolNkyGj https://t.co/xQyIKBAfLA

Due to the current Covid-19 situation our #flightschedule has been modified. We therefore kindly remind our passengers to regularly #check the #status of their flights:
👉 https://t.co/AYN9XNBEvp
☑️ MY BOOKINGS
💬 https://t.co/o9eUBINZHY
#WeAreAirDolomiti #WeCare https://t.co/aec4RtyJho

Our crew is always happy to welcome you on board. ✈️⁣
Thank you, Marta and Francesco, for keeping on smiling with your eyes! ❤️😊⁣

#WeAreAirDolomiti #AirDolomiti #AdAstra #Settimocielo #BackInTheSkyTogether⁣
#WeCare #StrongerTogether #HereForYou https://t.co/qlnJIY4COF

👉 https://t.co/XvFwUek0AC

In collaboration with @AtlCuneese
Ph. Credits: Roberto Croci https://t.co/KthLi80hxn

data.text:
Nonstante tutte le difficoltà del momento, non potevamo mancare all'appuntamento con #TTG2020. Con la nostra presenza e assieme ai colleghi #Lufthansa abbiamo voluto dare un chiaro segnale di positività e speranza💪🌈✈️
#WeAreAirDolomiti #WeAreLufthansaGroup #BackInTheSkyTogether https://t.co/V8pIdSPKz9

data.text: Right at the start of the #pandemic, we set up a taskforce of 7 colleagues who have now dealt with a total of 12,360 #refunds. As of today 15.10.2020, all refunds have been finalised. Special thanks go to our #passengers for their understanding. #StaySafe #BackInTheSkyTogether https://t.co/V7mvbp4B7i

Yesterday, our CEO Joerg Eberhart met the BOD of Luigi Ridolfi Airport, Forlì. Topic of the day was the airport's restart and its future potential. #Forlì airport will resume operations on Oct 31st, with Air Dolomiti serving the Munich HUB starting Dec 1st.

#BACKInTheSkyTogether https://t.co/ffFjuxqeLy

data.text:
To all the food lovers out there, here is your reason to fly to #Cuneo!
The #raviolas of the Varaita Valley. A special sort of gnocchi served with melted tomino cheese... and #buonappetito.
👉 https://t.co/XvFwUek0AC

In collaboration with @AtlCuneese 
Ph. Credits: L. Floriddia https://t.co/bBmjtmRXbT
Forlì is the perfect starting point for explorers and yes, it will surprise you! Ancient monuments, wonderful towns and to the Romagna Riviera.  https://t.co/2apWBHIjXt

Not only #Cuneo itself is worth a visit with its wide streets partly in renaissance style, but also its surroundings with castles, vineyards and mountains... Feeling the Italian vibe yet and ready to take off? 😉✈️https://t.co/fkXpx6yGjz

data.text:
As health and protection of our passengers and employees remain our top priority, we would like to remind you that the use of the surgical mask is mandatory during all of our flights. All details here 👉 https://t.co/Djvr0Qx6x9

#WeCare #BackInTheSkyTogether https://t.co/wW1hZDrj2N

Upgrades, hotels, car rentals and so much more... 😍 
Yeah but how? With Air Dolomiti and Miles&More!  
😉 Start today by becoming a member of Europe’s leading frequent flyer and awards program. Air Dolomiti and other 300 partners are waiting for you!  https://t.co/N8iV5MU6rI

Starting from November 16, Air Dolomiti will connect the Piedmont airport #CuneoAirport with @MUC_Airport, one of the major European hubs.
For further info: https://t.co/JaLC3HA909  https://t.co/JaLC3HA909 https://t.co/O4bOjAF353

data.text:
Lieti di avervi ospitati ieri a bordo @HellasVeronaFC✈️
#BackInTheSkyTogether https://t.co/p2vx6AA3qN

Starting a new week with a brand new route:
#Verona #Düsseldorf!
All details about our
✔️ flexible conditions
✔️ special fares
👉 https://t.co/tckjAJEEVH
#BackInTheSkyTogether https://t.co/M3p6nfcqVz

#BackInTheSkyTogether

Launching today #Verona – #BerlinTegel
At Air Dolomiti we are very pleased to collaborate once again with the Verona Airport “Valerio Catullo” while starting a new cooperation with @berlinairport !
What are you waiting for? 👉https://t.co/MzWdlc6tkb https://t.co/s4Kmb46Jch

#SAVETHEDATE Da sabato 25 luglio e per tutto il mese di agosto @arenadiverona riapre le sue porte al pubblico. 🥳
Scopri le speciali #promozioni dedicate a tutti i nostri passeggeri! 👉https://t.co/4aKpQLs8ov #BackInTheSkyTogether #inarena

Oggi ti diamo tanti buoni motivi per volare a #Düsseldorf da #Verona! 
⏰ Tariffe flessibili 
💸 Prenota ora, paga dopo
🌳 Ampie aree verdi 
🍻 "Altbier" la #birra tipica
Cosa aspetti?😉
https://t.co/TMbLXPLBsZ

Ora puoi volare a #Berlino anche da #Verona! ✈️
👉Tariffe flessibili 
👉Prenota ora, paga dopo. 
Perché Berlino?
🚲 Chilometri e chilometri di piste ciclabili
🍻 Numerose aree verdi
🎡 Perché è sempre bella, specialmente d'estate
https://t.co/rI14HTdmnE

data.text: We surely told you that we returned to fly to #Germany. Yet, we forgot the most important thing: #summer is of the best season! Long sunny days and good weather are at home here too! 😉Discover #Monaco, #Frankfurt, #Berlin and #Düsseldorf https://t.co/k3qfgvX1wS @GermanyTourism

data.text:
Happy to announce 2 new destinations in collaboration with #ValerioCatulloAirport. 

Starting July 30th and 31st you will be able to reach #Berlin and #Düsseldorf directly from #Verona ! 
#BackInTheSkyTogether https://t.co/Ar7XWUmFoA https://t.co/d5Ml4cUHu0

Quest'estate vola a #Palermo!🌞✈️
Con l'iniziativa “Fly to #Palermo, book 4 nights, get 1 night free” è ancora più conveniente! 
📲 https://t.co/80jC5ENbC8
👉 clicca il banner
🖊 compila il form
🎯 scegli la tua struttura preferita
#BuoneVacanze in #Sicilia! https://t.co/NkHuJh8klv

🍻🥨🎠 A little glimpse of beautiful #Munich
When you are ready, we are ready 😉
Video credits by @SimplyMunich
#BackInTheSkyTogether #SimplyMeetAgain #SimplyMunich https://t.co/8AOjnUkfVF

Buon weekend da #Palermo! ✈️
E per i fortunelli che saranno al mare, buon relax e buon sole! Ma ricordate di mettere la protezione! 😎⛱ #AirDolomiti #BackInTheSkyTogether #Firenze https://t.co/9JIA35JgxO

urls.title: Flights to Italy and Germany: Discover Europe | Air Dolomiti
urls.description: Fly to Germany and Italy with Air Dolomiti: discover all the connections and reach the main European destinations easily with our best fares.

data.text:
When are you coming?

Watch now 🎬 - you will be well prepared for your first flight and will know what safety measures are in place at @MUC_Airport 
Get ready for your first flight from #Munich to #Florence, #Turin and #Venice. 

👉 https://t.co/eUsJnOVDRP

#wecare 💙 https://t.co/keN5b8scea

urls.title: Flights to Italy and Germany: Discover Europe | Air Dolomiti
urls.description: Fly to Germany and Italy with Air Dolomiti: discover all the connections and reach the main European destinations easily with our best fares.

data.text:
#BackInTheSkyTogether
The sun might not be shining today, but we are ready to start exploring Italy again ✈️
We are back at @MUC_airport and serving:

Turin, 5x a week
Florence, 3x a week
Venice, 3x a week

👉 https://t.co/eUsJnPdeJn
Looking forward to seeing you all on board! 💙 https://t.co/wVWGc8gWYX

data.text: After more than two months of lockdown, on June 15 Air Dolomiti returns to fly to #Frankfurt from Verona and Turin and to #Munich from Florence, Venice and Turin. ✈️https://t.co/lk6ADCzwgR #BackInTheSkyTogether https://t.co/OrtkSe0oWD

Air Dolomiti ricomincia a volare da #Verona a #Francoforte
a partire dal 18 giugno con due frequenze giornaliere nei giorni di #giovedì, #venerdì, #sabato e #domenica. #BackInTheSkyTogether https://t.co/h6H307rQ9p https://t.co/OoUsuwWQwe

#BackInTheSkyTogether 
#Volare è stato prima di tutto un #sogno... 
Per quanto il nostro presente sia dovuto cambiare, il #futuro è nelle nostre mani: sta a noi ridisegnarlo e farlo decollare, ancora una volta! https://t.co/yV2PbBtMH0 https://t.co/UDQVqCnNyK

data.text: Air Dolomiti restarts from Italy! As of June 5th from #Florence to #Catania and #Palermo, from June 19th from Florence to #Cagliari. After an extended lockdown, citizens will be able to return to fly freely to #Sicily and #Sardina. #BackInTheSkyTogether https://t.co/YqEgXlgQ0M https://t.co/sG8Tt2Jkoq

#Repatriation activity continues for Italian citizens: Air Dolomiti plans a new flight from #Seville to #Milan Malpensa and #Rome Fiumicino on May 13th. https://t.co/rgcpA9Ujo4 https://t.co/u8frjKyQMT

Air Dolomiti invites passengers to wear protective masks on board from May 4th: https://t.co/esfRAThyzT
#WeAreInThisTogether #WeAreAirDolomiti 
Photo credits by Tonik on Unsplash https://t.co/88FUi9CyWU

domain.name: Reoccurring Trends
domain.description: Twitter generated Trends that occur on a daily, weekly, monthly, or yearly basis such as Monday motivation.

data.text:
Today is the right day to start learning Italian. And we start with something that will help us during this particular historical period: "andrà tutto bene". 
Which means nothing but "everything will be fine".
... And if it's our technicians who say so 😉
#MondayMotivation https://t.co/BXUlsaT1sh

Most of our flights may be temporarily suspended,but that won’t stop us.

With the Italian Ministry of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation we have organized the repatriation of Italian citizen from Latvia❤️

More info on https://t.co/QabyrcUIBw https://t.co/JHlpbK9T7J https://t.co/oxvrDgI3fN

data.text:
Protecting your health also while travelling 💙
Health always comes first, now more than ever.
And with this in mind, we invite you to take a look at the latest provisions taken by the Italian Ministry of Transport and implemented by Air Dolomiti.
👉 https://t.co/KdQnSAgvw6 https://t.co/jHwjfnZTiy

A splash of turquoise in the prevailing greyness 🌈
Starting from today and for all new bookings made from March the 20th onwards, you may schedule your flights with greater flexibility. 
More information 👇
#BookWithConfidence https://t.co/7gEb9Z5js7 https://t.co/KSXsONmO2Z

Beyond the clouds the sun is always shining🌈
#WeAreInThisTogether #WeAreAirDolomiti https://t.co/QPP3cfdXHi

data.text:
*** SERVICE INFO *** 
Air Dolomiti temporarily discontinues its regular flight operations starting March 18th to April 19th 2020. 
As always, we will take care of you. We await you and we will welcome you back again with a smile, ready for a new take-off. https://t.co/eUsJnOVDRP

data.text:
A Lufthansa flight containing 1500 medical suits to deal with the Coronavirus emergency has landed in Milan.
Air Dolomiti has coordinated the transport operation, maintaining contact with the Italian Embassy in Berlin. #WeAreInThisTogether https://t.co/dxnZWKsjGY

data.text:
Seek inspiration in the #AlternativeGuide and experience #Verona on two wheels! 🚲
Start at Via Torricelle, one of the most scenic roads in the city, stop to visit Castel San Pietro and then have breakfast at Bottega Del Krapfen https://t.co/xwmVxwvZ0f #VeronabyBike https://t.co/obDQ7nOMmt
How many planes take off across the world every day? See if you can guess... Then compare your answer with the one you'll find in today's article on the #AirDolomitiBlog https://t.co/Oatgeg04Bx

Where are the #BestPlacesToEat in #Bari? Perhaps it would be easier to tell you where not to eat, since the city is a sanctuary of #goodfood. We've managed to whittle it down to our #top5: https://t.co/ewT43sTlmx https://t.co/RM6UG3WesS

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category
domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations

data.text:
Do you know Bepi Suà? If you're visiting #Burano, you'll often hear talk of him, especially his home. It's a small work of art that never ceases to fascinate tourists and passers-by. Find out more on the #AlternativeGuide #Venice
https://t.co/6ZFnoap2MG https://t.co/bBJGUTeevP

Whether you arrive on foot, by bike or even running, the Monastery of San Michele in Bosco is a must-see stop in #Bologna! From up there, enjoy taking in the skyline of Bologna, a city that adores being admired ❤️ #AlternativeGuide 
https://t.co/nHFUbaLT4A https://t.co/x6IytkgjlP
#AirDolomiti apre a #Firenze un nuovo centro di manutenzione, in primavera inaugurerà una nuova base tecnica all’Amerigo Vespucci https://t.co/idapWCgwBF https://t.co/YFkfhBw70j
#AirDolomiti apre a #Firenze un nuovo centro di manutenzione, in primavera inaugurerà una nuova base tecnica all’Amerigo Vespucci https://t.co/idapWCgwBF

If you're in #Verona, you have the perfect excuse to take refuge in the Third Circle of Hell, reserved for the gluttonous. Verona will kidnap your taste buds and spoil them with local flavours. Find out our #top5 places to eat with #AlternativeGuide: https://t.co/qghzaC8NLT https://t.co/U2YrkGLf25

You'll see them all the time around #Bavaria. Hoisted on May 1st each year and a symbol of fertility and good luck, a #Maibaum looks a bit like an English #Maypole. The town of #Aying is home to the tallest one in Europe. #AlternativeGuide #Munich  https://t.co/oS2So8IGC7 https://t.co/mr4EXl6lx9

data.text:
Want to surprise your partner? 😎 Book an alternative #weekend in #Florence.
First stop: #BENè spa in Villa Cora , then dinner at the #Cibrèo restaurant in the stands of the Teatro del Sale. Follow our #AlternativeGuide tips: https://t.co/0uiDHGQr3A https://t.co/ibZVXWglZj

To satisfy the #avgeeks among you, we're looking to the world of military aviation... What happens when an aircraft runs out of #fuel but cannot land? Happy reading on the #AirDolomitiBlog! https://t.co/aDWrPjZbO0

*** IMPORTANT INFORMATION ***
On Jan 1 and 6 our social media channels will not be staffed and our Sales Center will remain closed. We will be back online on Jan 2 and 3. Our Sales Center will also be there on Jan 4 and 5 from 9 am to 5 pm! We wish you all a great #NewYear2020!

On Dec 25 and 26 our social media channels will not be staffed and our Sales Center will remain closed.
We will be back online on Dec 27, 30 and 31. Our Sales Center will be there also on Dec 28 and 29 from 9 am to 5 pm. We wish you a Merry Christmas & a Happy New Year! ♥️ https://t.co/o6w0Yeap12

data.text: RT @BLQairport: Good morning from #Bologna Airport! Live flight information here https://t.co/57Rcl2KB8l  📸@FabrizioBerni with @Air_Dolomit…

Developed by art collective @Sbagliato, the second edition of #ItalianGateways comes to #Frankfurt, bringing a taste of Italy to the appropriately named gateway to Germany. Have you visited any of these wonderful cities? #AirDolomiti @thetripmagazine #urbanart https://t.co/YSEfTu6hDe

A scenic ride on #tram19 is a great way to start your holiday in #Munich. The #AlternativeGuide will lead you to the Maximilianeum parliament, which takes on a gorgeous gold tinge at sunset. 
1. Justizpalast
2. Maximilianstraße
3. Maximilianeum
https://t.co/GEEspddJNb https://t.co/ue3c9epTPr
RT @journalffm: In Zusammenarbeit mit @Air_Dolomiti hat das Künstlertrio #Sbagliato in #Frankfurt die Tore nach #Italien geöffnet: An drei…

*** STRIKE IN ITALY ***

In the expectation of a strike action in Italy, affecting ground services Friday, Oct 25th: check your flight status by contacting our Sales Center +39 045 288 6140 (Mon-Fri 8.30 - 8pm, Sat-Sun 9am - 5pm) or theLufthansa Customer Service: 899 198 000
What's going on in #Frankfurt? The city will be peeking through some of Italy's most beautiful gateways... Keep following us! #AirDolomiti #ItalianGateways https://t.co/Ks8tSfYszj

A good reason to plan a trip to #Turin in the next weeks? For all the food lovers out there, the White Truffle International Fair!

For this occasion a direct 🚌 is available.
Further information 👉 https://t.co/R9L7xHmYOw https://t.co/0rFeVuZG1E
